page.title: 04TRANSPORT AND TRAFFIC
page.content: In the area we had to investigate for the project that we were doing. We carried out two traffic counts in Sproatley and Bilton,each for 1 hr. For our investigation we had to count cars going several directions. The traffic in Bilton was quite busy but the traffic in Sproatley wasn't quite as busy as the traffic in Bilton.It was mostly cars and vans with a few vehicles such as motorbikes and tractors.Altogether we counted nearly two hundred cars, nine or ten buses and forty trucks.There was not a lot of other vehicles compared to the number of vehicles that travel in a City. The traffic in Bilton was quite busy because it is the main road between Hull and Withernsea. In Sproatley the traffic was very quiet and there were some minutes in our count when no vehicles went past.
